thread.title: Ex-priest jailed for decade arrested on new sex charges | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Ex-priest jailed for decade arrested on new sex charges | Daily Mail Online

author: Associated Press
title: Ex-priest jailed for decade arrested on new sex charges | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Disgraced ex-priest, 74, who spent ten years in prison for raping an altar boy after he was unmasked in the Spotlight abuse investigation is arrested on 29 new sex charges Ex-priest Ronald Paquin was arrested Wednesday after being indicted in Maine on 29 counts of sexual misconduct dating to the 1980s and involving two boys Paquin was a central figure in the Boston archdiocese's sex abuse scandal, which was exposed by Boston Globe's Spotlight team The moment he was confronted by a reporter was dramatized in the 2015 film In 2002, he pleaded guilty to raping an altar boy and was sentenced to 12 to 15 years Keith Townsend, 42, has come out as one of victims in the new indictment, calling Paquin an evil 'predator' Published: 16:55 GMT, 8 February 2017 | Updated: 22:22 GMT, 9 February 2017 125 shares
